page.title: 09PEOPLE AND THEIR OCCUPATIONS
page.content: Many people in the area of Chardstock are farmers,some of the people in the Village go to work in Chard or Axminster.There are a few small industries in the Village of Chardstock-Gnome making,Double Glazing,Burglar Alarm System and a small Post Office.The Postman and paperman come around the village each week day delivering papers post and some children from the village do the paper round each Sunday,The Milk is delivered every other day.There are about 450 people in the village 100 of whom are children.Most of the Farms are Cattle dairy farms but some are beef and some are sheep farms.The country looks lovely in the springtime with all the wild Flowers out and the young lambs skipping around the fields.Some people come to the village to work.Many people have retired.
